math.alttext: \frac{H}{T}=\sum\limits_{\bf k}\left(r_{0}+c\,{\bf k}^{2}\right){\mid\varphi_{% \bf k}\mid}^{2}+uV^{-1}\sum\limits_{{\bf k}_{1},{\bf k}_{2},{\bf k}_{3}}% \varphi_{{\bf k}_{1}}\varphi_{{\bf k}_{2}}\varphi_{{\bf k}_{3}}\varphi_{-{\bf k% }_{1}-{\bf k}_{2}-{\bf k}_{3}}\;,

italic-b OPEN:( italic-mu CLOSE:) RELOP:equals LIMITOP:limit POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-k ARROW:to NUMBER:0 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-k POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 ADDOP:minus italic-eta POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end italic-s OPEN:( italic-k CLOSE:) POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 ADDOP:minus italic-eta POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end italic-G OPEN:( italic-s bold-k PUNCT:, italic-R POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-s POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-mu CLOSE:) PERIOD:.
b(\mu)=\lim\limits_{k\to 0}k^{2-\eta}s(k)^{2-\eta}\,G(s{\bf k},R_{s}\mu)\;.

X({\bf k},\mu)=\frac{1}{a}\,k^{-\eta}\,+\,\delta X({\bf k},\mu)\;,

italic-delta italic-X OPEN:( bold-k PUNCT:, italic-mu POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start MULOP:times POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ADDOP:plus italic-delta italic-mu CLOSE:) RELOP:equals italic-X OPEN:( bold-k PUNCT:, italic-mu POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start MULOP:times POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ADDOP:plus italic-delta italic-mu CLOSE:) ADDOP:minus italic-X OPEN:( bold-k PUNCT:, italic-mu POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start MULOP:times POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end CLOSE:) PUNCT:,
\delta X({\bf k},\mu^{*}+\delta\mu)=X({\bf k},\mu^{*}+\delta\mu)-X({\bf k},\mu% ^{*})\;,

italic-mu POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start MULOP:times POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals LIMITOP:limit POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-s ARROW:to ID:infinity POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-R POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-s POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-mu POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start MULOP:times POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ADDOP:plus italic-delta italic-mu CLOSE:) PUNCT:,
\mu^{*}=\lim\limits_{s\to\infty}R_{s}(\mu^{*}+\delta\mu)\;,

\delta c\,=\,B\;\epsilon^{2}\,+o(\epsilon^{3})\;,

italic-delta italic-X OPEN:( bold-k PUNCT:, italic-mu CLOSE:) RELOP:equals NUMBER:2 italic-delta italic-c ADDOP:plus italic-k POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start ADDOP:minus NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end OPEN:[ italic-delta Sigma OPEN:( bold-k PUNCT:, italic-mu CLOSE:) ADDOP:minus italic-delta Sigma OPEN:( NUMBER:bold-0 PUNCT:, italic-mu CLOSE:) CLOSE:] PUNCT:,
\delta X({\bf k},\mu)=2\,\delta c+k^{-2}\,[\delta\Sigma({\bf k},\mu)-\delta% \Sigma({\bf 0},\mu)]\;,

u^{*}=\,A\,\epsilon\,+o(\epsilon^{2})\;.

italic-delta italic-X OPEN:( bold-k PUNCT:, italic-mu CLOSE:) RELOP:equals italic-epsilon POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end OPEN:[ italic-C POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:1 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( Delta CLOSE:) ADDOP:plus italic-C POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( Delta CLOSE:) OPFUNCTION:natural-logarithm italic-k CLOSE:] ADDOP:plus italic-o OPEN:( italic-epsilon POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:3 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end CLOSE:) italic-a italic-t italic-k ARROW:to NUMBER:0 PUNCT:,
\delta X({\bf k},\mu)=\epsilon^{2}\,[\,C_{1}(\Delta)+C_{2}(\Delta)\,\ln k\,]\,% +o(\epsilon^{3})\;\;\;at\;k\to 0\;,

italic-X OPEN:( bold-k PUNCT:, italic-mu CLOSE:) RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:1 ARG:end ARG:start italic-a ARG:end italic-k POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start ADDOP:minus italic-eta POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ADDOP:plus italic-b POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:1 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-k POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-epsilon ADDOP:plus italic-o OPEN:( italic-epsilon POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end CLOSE:) POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ADDOP:plus italic-b POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end italic-k POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 ADDOP:plus italic-o OPEN:( italic-epsilon CLOSE:) POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end ADDOP:plus ID:ldots
X({\bf k},\mu)=\frac{1}{a}k^{-\eta}+b_{1}k^{\epsilon+o(\epsilon^{2})}+b_{2}k^{% 2+o(\epsilon)}+...

italic-delta italic-X OPEN:( bold-k PUNCT:, italic-mu CLOSE:) RELOP:equals italic-b POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:1 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-epsilon PUNCT:, Delta CLOSE:) OPEN:[ NUMBER:1 ADDOP:plus italic-epsilon OPFUNCTION:natural-logarithm italic-k ADDOP:plus italic-o OPEN:( italic-epsilon POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end CLOSE:) CLOSE:]
\delta X({\bf k},\mu)=b_{1}(\epsilon,\Delta)\,[\,1+\epsilon\ln k+o(\epsilon^{2% })\,]
